verses.verse: And there came <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> angels <S%H4397><s%> to Sodom <S%H5467><s%> at even; <S%H6153><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Sodom: <S%H5467><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> them rose <S%H6965><s%> up to meet <S%H7125><s%> them; and he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself with his face <S%H639><s%> toward the ground; <S%H776><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> my lords, <S%H113><s%> turn <S%H5493><s%> in, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, into <S%H413><s%> your servant's <S%H5650><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and tarry <S%H3885><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night, and wash <S%H7364><s%> your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and you shall rise <S%H7925><s%> up early, <S%H7925><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> on your ways. <S%H1870><s%> And they said, <S%H559><s%> No; <S%H3808><s%> but we will abide <S%H3885><s%> in the street <S%H7339><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night.

And he pressed <S%H6484><s%> on them greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and they turned <S%H5493><s%> in to him, and entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his house; <S%H1004><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> them a feast, <S%H4960><s%> and did bake <S%H644><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, and they did eat. <S%H398><s%>

But before <S%H2962><s%> they lay <S%H7901><s%> down, the men <S%H582><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> even the men <S%H582><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> round, <S%H5921><s%> both old <S%H2205><s%> and young, <S%H5288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> from every quarter: <S%H7098><s%>

And they called <S%H7121><s%> to Lot, <S%H3876><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Where <S%H346><s%> are the men <S%H582><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in to you this night? <S%H3915><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> them out to us, that we may know <S%H3045><s%> them.
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out at the door <S%H6607><s%> to them, and shut <S%H5462><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him,
And said, <S%H559><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, brothers, <S%H251><s%> do not so wickedly. <S%H7489><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I have two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not known <S%H3045><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> let me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, bring <S%H3318><s%> them out to you, and do <S%H6213><s%> you to them as is good <S%H2896><s%> in your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> nothing; <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1697><s%> for therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> they under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of my roof. <S%H6982><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> Stand <S%H5066><s%> back. <S%H1973><s%> And they said <S%H559><s%> again, This one <S%H259><s%> fellow came <S%H935><s%> in to sojourn, <S%H1481><s%> and he will needs <S%H8199><s%> be a judge: <S%H8199><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> will we deal worse <S%H7489><s%> with you, than with them. And they pressed <S%H6484><s%> sore <S%H3966><s%> on the man, <S%H376><s%> even Lot, <S%H3876><s%> and came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to break <S%H7665><s%> the door. <S%H1817><s%>

But the men <S%H582><s%> put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and pulled <S%H935><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to them, and shut <S%H5462><s%> to the door. <S%H1817><s%>

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> that were at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> with blindness, <S%H5575><s%> both small <S%H6996><s%> and great: <S%H1419><s%> so that they wearied <S%H3811><s%> themselves to find <S%H4672><s%> the door. <S%H6607><s%>

And the men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Lot, <S%H3876><s%> Have you here <S%H6311><s%> any <S%H4310><s%> besides? <S%H5750><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> and your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have in the city, <S%H5892><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> them out of this place: <S%H4725><s%>

For we will destroy <S%H7843><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the cry <S%H6818><s%> of them is waxen great <S%H1431><s%> before <S%H854><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> us to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it.

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to his sons <S%H2860><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> which married <S%H3947><s%> his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Up, get <S%H3318><s%> you out of this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will destroy <S%H7843><s%> this city. <S%H5892><s%> But he seemed <S%H1961><s%> <S%H5869><s%> as one that mocked <S%H6711><s%> to his sons <S%H2860><s%> in law. <S%H2859><s%>

And when <S%H3644><s%> the morning <S%H7837><s%> arose, <S%H5927><s%> then the angels <S%H4397><s%> hastened <S%H213><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> and your two <S%H8147><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> which are here; <S%H4672><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you be consumed <S%H5595><s%> in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And while he lingered, <S%H4102><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> laid hold <S%H2388><s%> on his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> and on the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> being merciful <S%H2551><s%> to him: and they brought <S%H3318><s%> him forth, <S%H3318><s%> and set <S%H3240><s%> him without <S%H2351><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when they had brought <S%H3318><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> that he said, <S%H559><s%> Escape <S%H4422><s%> for your life; <S%H5315><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> not behind <S%H310><s%> you, neither <S%H408><s%> stay <S%H5975><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> the plain; <S%H3603><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you be consumed. <S%H5595><s%>
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Oh, <S%H4994><s%> not so, my LORD: <S%H113><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> has found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> and you have magnified <S%H1431><s%> your mercy, <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have showed <S%H6213><s%> to me in saving <S%H2421><s%> my life; <S%H5315><s%> and I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> some evil <S%H7451><s%> take <S%H1692><s%> me, and I die: <S%H4191><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> to, and it is a little <S%H4705><s%> one: Oh, <S%H4994><s%> let me escape <S%H4422><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> (is it not a little <S%H4705><s%> one?) and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live. <S%H2421><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, See, <S%H2009><s%> I have accepted <S%H5375><s%> you concerning this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> that I will not overthrow <S%H2015><s%> this city, <S%H5892><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> you have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Haste <S%H4116><s%> you, escape <S%H4422><s%> thither; <S%H8033><s%> for I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> anything <S%H1697><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> you be come <S%H935><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> was risen <S%H3318><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> when Lot <S%H3876><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> on Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and on Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> brimstone <S%H1614><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of heaven; <S%H8064><s%>

And he overthrew <S%H2015><s%> those <S%H411><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain, <S%H3603><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and that which grew <S%H6780><s%> on the ground. <S%H127><s%>
But his wife <S%H802><s%> looked <S%H5027><s%> back from behind <S%H310><s%> him, and she became <S%H1961><s%> a pillar <S%H5333><s%> of salt. <S%H4417><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> got up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> he stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he looked <S%H8259><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> and toward <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the plain, <S%H3603><s%> and beheld, <S%H7200><s%> and, see, <S%H2009><s%> the smoke <S%H7008><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up as the smoke <S%H7008><s%> of a furnace. <S%H3536><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when God <S%H430><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H3603><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the overthrow, <S%H2018><s%> when he overthrew <S%H2015><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> in the which <S%H834><s%> <S%H2004><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> dwelled. <S%H3427><s%>

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up out of Zoar, <S%H6820><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> with him; for he feared <S%H3372><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Zoar: <S%H6820><s%> and he dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in a cave, <S%H4631><s%> he and his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

And the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the younger, <S%H6810><s%> Our father <S%H1><s%> is old, <S%H2204><s%> and there is not a man <S%H376><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> in to us after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

Come, <S%H3212><s%> let us make our father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> and we will lie <S%H7901><s%> with him, that we may preserve <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> of our father. <S%H1><s%>

And they made their father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> that night: <S%H3915><s%> and the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in, and lay <S%H7901><s%> with her father; <S%H1><s%> and he perceived <S%H3045><s%> not when she lay <S%H7901><s%> down, nor when she arose. <S%H6965><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> that the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the younger, <S%H6810><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I lay <S%H7901><s%> last night <S%H570><s%> with my father: <S%H1><s%> let us make him drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%> also; <S%H1571><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> you in, and lie <S%H7901><s%> with him, that we may preserve <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> of our father. <S%H1><s%>

And they made their father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> and the younger <S%H6810><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with him; and he perceived <S%H3045><s%> not when she lay <S%H7901><s%> down, nor when she arose. <S%H6965><s%>
Thus were both <S%H8147><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> with child <S%H2029><s%> by their father. <S%H1><s%>

And the first born <S%H1067><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Moab: <S%H4124><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the younger, <S%H6810><s%> she also bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Benammi: <S%H1151><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
